title: Drawing, "Fountain Supported by Three Harpies and Three Groups of People in Garden in Villa Albani, Rome", 1780–1820
medium: Black chalk on off white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed on fountain's base: Villa Albani
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Large fountain with two bowls, lower basin supported by central post and three winged Harpies. Three groups of people nearby on platform.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fountain Supported by Three Harpies and Three Groups of People in Garden in Villa Albani, Rome", 1780–1820.
1780–1820. Black chalk on off white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3041.
